subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: After their three-day, 11-hour match in Wimbledon’s first round last year, John Isner and Nicolas Mahut drew each other again for this year’s first round.
snippet: After their three-day, 11-hour match in Wimbledon’s first round last year, John Isner and Nicolas Mahut drew each other again for this year’s first round.
